task_summary: Remove the lid from the pot, place the pot onto the plate, then use the spatula to push the pot toward the front edge of the table.

task_long_description.overview: The scene shows a tabletop with a small pot and lid, a plate (shallow dish), and a flat spatula-like tool. A robot arm must first expose the pot by removing/opening it, then grasp and relocate the pot to the plate. After placement, the robot employs the nearby spatula as a pushing tool to slide the pot toward the tableâ€™s front edge, aligning it with the operator. The sequence prioritizes reliable perception, gentle contact, and short, controlled motions within the tabletop workspace.
preconditions: Pot, lid, plate, and spatula present and reachable
Table surface is clear enough for motion
Robot is homed with an empty gripper
Sensing available to detect pot and lid
stepwise_plan: Open container by removing the lid
Prepare gripper and compute a top grasp for the pot
Place the pot at the designated pose on the plate
Use the spatula to push the pot toward the table front
success_criteria: Lid no longer covering the pot
Pot rests on the plate stably
Pot translated toward the front edge as intended
Robot ends in a safe, non-contact state
failure_and_recovery: If grasp fails, recompute grasp and retry
If push stalls due to friction, shorten distance and reattempt
If placement is misaligned, re-place with adjusted yaw
task_long_description.termination: Terminate once the pot is on the plate and pushed forward, and the arm has retreated to a safe pose.

frame_3.now_evidence: First clear separation of the lid from the pot with alignment of the end-effector above the opening.
frame_3.predicts_next: Completion of lid removal followed by grasp planning for the pot.

task_instruction: Take the lid off the pot, put the pot on the plate, and use the tool to push to pot to the front of the table.

node_specs.description: Perceive the lid to enable opening.
Remove the lid / open the pot.
Prepare fingers for grasping the pot.
Plan a top grasp for the pot.
Place the pot at the pose on the plate.
Use the spatula to push the pot toward the table front.
Back off to a safe pose after completion.

failure_modes: Object not detected or partially occluded
recovery_strategy: Shorten PushWithTool distance or repeat push
assumptions: Using OpenContainer(target=pot, container_type=pot) to represent lid removal
Tool is a spatula; push direction toward the operator modeled as 180 degrees
Frames suggest the plate is in front/right; final frame shows retreat after push
